title: Crime Alert 12.05.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.05.18
description:
Good Samaritan stops to help mom and baby, gets stabbed to death. Officials trying to confirm man's claims that he's killed more than 90 people. The House of Horrors children will testify against the parents if case goes to trial.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
